remarks: An alternate version of the value of the cardinal number of a set. Compare ~ cardval .  This theorem could be used to give us a simpler definition of ` card ` in place of ~ df-card .  It apparently does not occur in the literature.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Nov-2003.)
statement:
cardval2 $p |- ( A e. dom card -> ( card ` A ) = { x e. On | x ~< A } ) $.
$d A x $.
